title: Paint Scraper
info: The Paint Scraper is a tool which is used to remove paint off tiles and walls, eliminating the need of breaking and re-placing a tile to remove its paint. The Paint Scraper is purchased for 1 from the Painter. Its upgrade, the Spectre Paint Scraper, grants a bonus to range and can collect moss. Paint removed by a scraper can never be recovered.
